cz.ive.genius
Class GeniusList

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.genius.GeniusList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable, java.io.Serializable
public class GeniusList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Updateable

List of all active geniuses. It is to be used by a Gui in GeniusTree. This class is a Singleton.

Author:
ondra
See Also:
